section.text: *NOTE: This section has been amended by emergency legislation with identical permanent legislation that will become effective in January, 2022.*
section.heading: Rules.

annotations.annotation: Approval of Nurses’ Training Corps rules: Pursuant to Resolution 8-286, the “Nurses Training Corps Establishment Act Proposed Rules Approval Resolution of 1990”, effective November 2, 1990, the Council approved the proposed rules issued pursuant to the Nurses Training Corps Establishment Act of 1987.
Delegation of authority pursuant to D.C. Law 7-32, the “Nurses Training Corps Establishment Act of 1987”, see Mayor’s Order 89-183, August 14, 1989.
For temporary (90 day) addition of sections, see §§ 809, 810 of Child and Youth, Safety and Health Omnibus Emergency Amendment Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-310, March 26, 2002, 49 DCR 3420).
For temporary (90 day) addition of sections, see §§ 802 to 807 of Child and Youth, Safety and Health Omnibus Emergency Amendment Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-310, March 26, 2002, 49 DCR 3420).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 4121 of Fiscal Year 2022 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-159, Aug. 23, 2021, 68 DCR 008602).
